paper_abstract: IN SYSTEMS WHERE A LACK OF SAFETY OR SECURITY GUARANTEES CAN BE CATASTROPHIC OR EVEN FATAL, NONINTERFERENCE IS USED TO SEPARATE DOMAINS HANDLING CRITICAL (OR CONFIDENTIAL) INFORMATION FROM THOSE PROCESSING NORMAL (OR UNCLASSIFIED) DATA FOR FAULT CONTAINMENT AND EASE OF VERIFICATION. SURFNOC SIGNIFICANTLY REDUCES THE LATENCY INCURRED BY STRICT TEMPORAL PARTITIONING.
paper_title: NETWORKS ON CHIP WITH PROVABLE SECURITY PROPERTIES
